sentences.sContent: In the outer part of that shadow, the penumbra, part of the Sun, is blocked.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the outer part of that shadow, the penumbra, part of the Sun, is blocked.
sentences.sCn: 而影子外面部分的半影，被太阳的一部分挡住。

sentences.sContent: Moon enters penumbra: instant of first external tangency of moon with the penumbra.
sentences.sContent_eng: Moon enters penumbra: instant of first external tangency of moon with the penumbra.
sentences.sCn: 半影食始：月球刚刚和半影接触，这时肉眼觉察不到。

sentences.sContent: Partial solar eclipses occur when the Moon's penumbra touches Earth; partial lunar eclipses occur when the only part of the Moon passes through Earth's umbra.
sentences.sContent_eng: Partial solar eclipses occur when the Moon's penumbra touches Earth; partial lunar eclipses occur when the only part of the Moon passes through Earth's umbra.
sentences.sCn: 地球上被月球半影扫过的地方可见日偏食，而当只有部份月球进入地球本影时， 月偏食便会发生。

words.tran: 日月半影的；界限不明的
